inputMap - Variable in class com.koucha.experimentalgame.input.InputBridge
This InputMap maps callbacks to key codes and is needed for dynamic forwarding of InputEvents
InputMap - Class in com.koucha.experimentalgame.input
Maps callbacks (implementing InputMap.Callback) to key codes

InputMap.Callback - Interface in com.koucha.experimentalgame.input
Callback interface to be implemented for example through lambda-expressions: (evt) -> { ... }
InputMap.Key - Class in com.koucha.experimentalgame.input
Represents a key and holds a linked list of all callbacks bound to this key
InputMap.Key.Linker - Class in com.koucha.experimentalgame.input
Element of the linked List containing the InputMap.Link objects
InputMap.Link - Class in com.koucha.experimentalgame.input
Represents a callback and its display name
InputMap.NoLinkFoundException - Exception in com.koucha.experimentalgame.input
Is thrown, if the search for a key didn't lead to a result, because the key is not registered in the map
